document_data.name: Mosque of Honored Elders
document_data.source: [[A Dozen and One Adventures|A Dozen and One Adventures (Campaign Book)]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mosque of Honored Elders''' was a temple devoted to [[Kor]], the [[Zakharan pantheon|Zakharan]] god of wisdom, found in [[Muluk]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The mosque was situated so that it faced the [[Plaza of the Ancients]].
document_data.Activities: In addition to the worship of Kor, the mosque supported a hospital known to aid all those in need so long as they were [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]]. Donations were always appreciated for services received.
